value.original: Allow sorting by this field in the popup grid.

row.value: Permitir ordenar en base a este campo en el grid del popup

value.original: Allow sorting by this field in the popup grid.

row.value: Permitir ordenar en base a este campo en el grid del popup.

value.original: Default Expression
Default Expression
Defines a expression used to filter the property

row.value: Define una expresión usada paa filtrar la propiedad

value.original:
Defines a JavaScript expression that will be evaluated in the server side and used as default value for the property. You can use any type of variable but it must match the property type, examples:
true - the property associated is boolean "Hello" - the propery associated is string 5.3 - the property associated is numeric
You can also access the Openbravo API through the OB object and do some more complex expressions, e.g.
OB.getSession().getAttribute("SESSIONVAR");
This will retrieve the session variable SESSIONVAR and use it as default value for the selector field

row.value:
Defines a JavaScript expression that will be evaluated in the server side and used as default value for the property. You can use any type of variable but it must match the property type, examples:
true - the property associated is boolean "Hello" - the propery associated is string 5.3 - the property associated is numeric
You can also access the Openbravo API through the OB object and do some more complex expressions, e.g.
OB.getSession().getAttribute("SESSIONVAR");
This will retrieve the session variable SESSIONVAR and use it as default value for the selector field

value.original: Selector Out Field
Selector Out Field
Identifies the 'out field' from which get a value on a row selection

row.value: Identifica el campo de salida desde el cual se obtiene el valor en una selección de fila

value.original: The new selector can define a field as 'Out Field'. If a column from a tab is using a selector with an out field it will get listed. A field from the tab can receive the value of an Selector Out Field when the user picks a record in the selector. This fields establishes the connection between a selector out field and a field in the tab.

row.value: The new selector can define a field as 'Out Field'. If a column from a tab is using a selector with an out field it will get listed. A field from the tab can receive the value of an Selector Out Field when the user picks a record in the selector. This fields establishes the connection between a selector out field and a field in the tab.

value.original: Path/name of the property to show in the selector

row.value: Dirección/Nombre de la propiedad a mostrar en el selector

value.original: Path/name of the property to show in the selector

row.value: Path/name of the property to show in the selector

value.original: Filter Expression
Filter Expression
Defines a JavaScript expression that returns a HQL where clause

row.value: Define una expresión en javascript que retorna una cláusula where HQL

value.original: Defines a JavaScript expression evaluated on the server that returns a HQL where clause string and will be appended in the where clause. HQL where clause is static defined where clause. The filter expression can use JavaScript to access the Openbravo API evaluate on the fly and return a HQL dynamically. Note: This expression expression must always return a string value, e.g. "e.customer = true"

row.value: Defines a JavaScript expression evaluated on the server that returns a HQL where clause string and will be appended in the where clause. HQL where clause is static defined where clause. The filter expression can use JavaScript to access the Openbravo API evaluate on the fly and return a HQL dynamically. Note: This expression expression must always return a string value, e.g. "e.customer = true"

value.original: Value Field
Value Field
The value of this field will be set in the foreign key column.

row.value: El valor de este campo será colocado en la columna de la llave foránea.

value.original: The value of this field will be set in the foreign key column. Normally this field does not need to be set. If not set then the id of the referenced entity is used.

row.value: The value of this field will be set in the foreign key column. Normally this field does not need to be set. If not set then the id of the referenced entity is used.

value.original: Show in grid
Defines if the field is shown in the popup grid.

row.value: Define si el campo será mostrar en el grid del popup

value.original: Defines if the field is shown in the popup grid.

row.value: Defines if the field is shown in the popup grid.

value.original: Sorting of columns in a grid
Column Sorting
Defines the sorting of columns in a grid

row.value: Define el ordenamiento de las columnas en el grid

value.original:
HQL Query code to populate selector's grid.
Retrieved columns must have an alias defined, this alias is used to identify the returned value with a selector field. It is mandatory to set the "@additional_filters@" String on the main where clause. It is forbidden to include an Order by clause in the HQL, the order is defined on the Selector fields.

row.value:
HQL Query code to populate selector's grid.
Retrieved columns must have an alias defined, this alias is used to identify the returned value with a selector field. It is mandatory to set the "@additional_filters@" String on the main where clause. It is forbidden to include an Order by clause in the HQL, the order is defined on the Selector fields.

value.original: Entity Alias
Entity Alias

In case that the the selector's table has an alias in the HQL it is mandatory to set it on this field. This alias is used to add some mandatory filters on the Where clause replacing the @additional_filters@ string. Some examples of added filters are: client, organization and active flag.

row.value: In case that the the selector's table has an alias in the HQL it is mandatory to set it on this field. This alias is used to add some mandatory filters on the Where clause replacing the @additional_filters@ string. Some examples of added filters are: client, organization and active flag.

value.original: Custom Query
Custom Query
Indicates that a custom query is used to fill out the selector's grid.

row.value: Indica si se usará una consulta customizada para llenar el selector del grid.

value.original: Display Column Alias

row.value: Alias de La Columna a Mostrar

value.original: Display Column Alias

row.value: Alias de La Columna a Mostrar

value.original: Alias of the HQL query column to be shown

row.value: Alias de la columna con consulta HQL a ser mostrada

value.original: Clause Left Part
Clause Left Part
Left part of a clause to be used on the where or order by clauses of the HQL.

row.value: Parte izquierda de la cláusula que será usada en las cláusulas HQL 'where' o 'order by'.

value.original: Show In Picklist
Show In Picklist
Sets additional fields to appear on the selectors pick list.

row.value: Coloca campos adicionales que aparecerán en la lista a escoger del selector.

value.original: Search in suggestion box
Defines if the field is used to search when retrieving values in the suggestion box.

row.value: Define si el campo será usado como una búsqueda cuando se obtengan los valores en la caja de sugerencias

value.original: Defines if the field is used to search when retrieving values in the suggestion box.

row.value: Defines if the field is used to search when retrieving values in the suggestion box.

Popup Text Match Style
Defines the text matching logic used in the filters in the popup grid.

value.original: Selector Field
Selector Field
Unique identifying key for the selector field record.

row.value: Llave única para la entrada del selector.

value.original: Unique identifying key for the selector field record.

row.value: Unique identifying key for the selector field record.

Make it possible to filter in the grid using this field.

value.original: Out Field
Out Field
The value of this field should be returned to the opener window

row.value: El valor de este campo será retornado a la ventana padre

value.original: The unique identifying key for the selector.

row.value: La llave única para el selector.

value.original: Display Field
Display Field
The value of this field will be displayed in the selector text input box.

Suggestion Text Match Style
Defines the text matching logic used in the suggestion box.

value.original: HQL Where Clause
HQL Where Clause
The HQL where clause is added to the query to retrieve the data which is returned by the datasource.

row.value: The HQL where clause is added to the query to retrieve the data which is returned by the datasource.

value.original: The HQL where clause is added to the query to retrieve the data which is returned by the datasource. When refering to properties of the entity shown in the selector then use the prefix e. For example if the selector shows Products then refering to product category works like this: e.productCategory.name='Ceramics'.

row.value: The HQL where clause is added to the query to retrieve the data which is returned by the datasource. When refering to properties of the entity shown in the selector then use the prefix e. For example if the selector shows Products then refering to product category works like this: e.productCategory.name='Ceramics'.
